original_text: Give ear, O Shepherd of Israel, thou that leadest Joseph like a flock; thou that dwellest between the cherubims, shine forth.
korean_text: 요셉을 양 떼 같이 인도하시는 이스라엘의 목자여 귀를 기울이소서 그룹 사이에 좌정하신 이여 빛을 비추소서

sentences.original_text: Give ear, O Shepherd of Israel
thou that leadest Joseph like a flock
thou that dwellest between the cherubims
